DOC.brief_summary: Observational registry include patient peripheral artery disease due femoro-popliteal stenosis occlusion treat cut ballon- subsequent drug-coated-ballon-percutaneous-transluminal-angioplasty ( PTA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Registry Cutting Balloon DCB Intervention Femoropopliteal Stenosis/Occlusion .
DOC.detailed_description: The registry include consecutive patient symptomatic peripheral artery disease due femoro-popliteal stenosis occlusion treat cut ballon- subsequent drug-coated-ballon-percutaneous-transluminal-angioplasty ( PTA ) . Interventional procedure : 1 . PTA Cutting-Balloon ( 60-120 second ) . 2 . PTA Drug-Coated-Balloon ( 60 second ) . Technical success define 1. recoil > 30 % 2. dissection > Type B 3. stenting > 30 % lesion length . Follow-up patient 6 month 12 month ( ABI , Rutherford-classification , MACE , TLR , TVR , Binary Restenosis ) .
DOC.criteria: peripheral artery disease ( PAD ) femoropopliteal stenosis > 70 % occlusion ( vessel diameter 46mm ) age 1899 informed consent proximal / iliacal stenosis stenosis/occlusion artery knee
